long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Powrbot is a free-to-use web-app that turns company names into data, like their website/URL, industry, location/headquarters & revenue.

Our data sources include wikis and search engines/aggregators.

Using Powrbot is simple:

1. Sign up at https://powrbot.com,
2. Grab your secret key under Developer
3. Add your company names to the Google Sheet
4. Select Plugins > Powrbot
5. Select the row with Company Data
